title: Blended Technology Learning Design for Strengthening Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and general proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Short intensive course for in-service professionals to strengthen mathematics education competencies, implementing a blended learning environment combining community-based inquiry and design thinking

learning_goals: Learners can design lessons utilizing three digital tools suitable for mathematics education content.
Learners can collaboratively propose strategies for operating an online discussion community based on the COI model.
Learners can develop a design thinking prototype for improving mathematics pedagogy by applying the LbyD framework.
Learners can improve technology-enhanced mathematics lesson designs based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
